comments: Although there were more papers to do then I would have liked, Mr Stevens cares about the success of his students. Allowed certain assignments to be done over if you didnt get the best grade. Also very nice about allowing late work long as you follow his late work rules. Very good teacher overall.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (2)  Participation matters (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: As an English major, I have taken at least (5) courses with Dr. Stevens. He is a thorough professor and a nice guy! You will definitely learn in his courses! One caveat is that all of his courses are ONLINE.. If you are not comfortable with electronic communication, I don\'t advise taking his courses...He lives in Maine, after all!
